reviews.comments: Had a lovely stay. The room was as advertised. The only issue was that I was told I can have my room cleaned after 6 days of my stay. As I stayed for two weeks, I went to ask the reception to have my room cleaned twice. After both times, nobody cleaned it and by the end of my stay, the toilet and floor had become dirty.
reviews.response: We’re pleased to hear you had a lovely stay, Daksh. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the room cleaning. Your feedback is valuable, and we’ll address this with our team to ensure improvements are made. We hope to have the opportunity to host you again in the future.

reviews.comments: It was a good place to stay, very convenient location and decent room, would have been helpful if the place was cleaner and I was informed I could ask for a sheet change after 6 days untill it was too late. But overall a great place to stay in London.
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback, Prerna. We’re pleased you found the location convenient and the room decent. We apologize for the cleanliness issues and any confusion about the sheet change policy. We’ll address these concerns to improve our service. We hope to welcome you back in the future!

reviews.comments: should be a tv, no plugs near the bed and the bed moves. other than that not a bad stay and nice and quiet
reviews.response:
Thank you for your feedback! We're glad to hear that you found your stay nice and quiet. We appreciate your suggestions about adding a TV, providing plugs near the bed, and addressing the bed movement.
Your comments will help us improve for future guests. We hope to welcome you back for an even better experience!

reviews.comments: I was quite disappointed with my stay. Despite the reviews, I gave it a chance. The room was spacious, well-lit, and new, but I faced many issues. One night, the water stopped, and I needed to shower. They offered me to use the staff bathroom, which was filthy. This happened at 11 PM, and I had to wait a long time until they managed to turn the water back on, as I refused to shower in the dirty room they offered. There was no hot water throughout my stay, and I ended up taking cold showers for 7 nights. The bedlinen was dirty when I arrived, with insects and hair. To solve this situation the staff offering me sheets from another room that I had to get and change myself. The main light didn’t work, and despite reporting it daily, nothing was done. The building and location are good, but the staff is not equipped to handle guest requests.
reviews.response:
I'm truly sorry to hear about your disappointing experience. It’s unacceptable that you faced so many issues during your stay, especially regarding the water supply and the cleanliness of the bed linens.
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience of having to take cold showers and for the condition of the staff bathroom. It’s concerning that your requests for repairs, like the main light, were not addressed during your stay.
Your feedback is invaluable, and we will be sure to address these issues with our team to ensure that we improve our service and facilities. Thank you for bringing these matters to our attention, and we hope to provide a much better experience in the future.

reviews.comments: Excellent rapport qualité prix. Correspond aux photos. Bien situé. Je recommande. Et pour un prochain séjour seule, je reviendrai ici, simple et efficace.

localizedReview.comments: Excellent value for money. Matches photos. Well located. I recommend it. And for a future stay alone, I will come back here, simple and efficient.
localizedReview.response: Thank you very much for your feedback, Lorie! We're so glad you found our value to be a great fit and the location and photos met your expectations. We would be happy to host you again for a future solo stay!

reviews.response: Merci beaucoup pour votre avis, Lorie ! Nous sommes ravis que vous ayez trouvé notre rapport qualité-prix excellent et que l’emplacement et les photos aient correspondu à vos attentes. Nous serions heureux de vous accueillir à nouveau pour un futur séjour en solo !

reviews.comments: Clean
reviews.response:
Thank you for your feedback! We're glad to hear that you found the accommodation clean.
We hope to welcome you back soon!

reviews.comments: 非常好

localizedReview.response: Thank you for your feedback!We are very happy that you found it very good.If you have any suggestions or need help, please don't hesitate to let us know.Looking forward to welcoming you again!

reviews.comments: Great place to stay. Got what you payed for
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback! We’re glad to hear you felt you got good value for your stay. If you need anything else or have any suggestions for improvement, feel free to let us know. We hope to see you again soon!
Thank you for staying with us and we hope to host you again in the future.

reviews.comments: Good place to live for short stays. Next to cally park which is great.
reviews.response:
Thank you for your feedback! We’re happy to hear that you found it a good place for short stays and enjoyed the proximity to Cally Park.
We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

reviews.comments: Good location and friendly staff, the bathroom could have been cleaner but the rest of the room was fine.
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback! We're pleased to hear that you liked the location and found our staff friendly. We apologize for the bathroom not meeting your cleanliness expectations and will address this with our housekeeping team to ensure it’s improved. If there's anything else we can do to enhance your experience, please let us know. We hope to welcome you back soon!

reviews.comments: It’s small but clean, really convenient and with fine price!
reviews.response:
Thank you for your feedback! We’re glad to hear that you found the space clean, convenient, and reasonably priced.
We hope to welcome you back for another stay!

reviews.comments:
Great space for resting your head if you need to be in central London in the daytime.
The bed was comfy and the room very clean.
There wasn't much to do in the local area, but only a 5 minute walk to the local tube station.
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback! We’re glad to hear you found the bed comfy and the room clean. It's great that the location worked well for easy access to central London during the day. We appreciate your note about the local area, and we hope the proximity to the tube station made up for it. Hope to see you soon!

reviews.comments: Great stay, thank you ava and team
reviews.response:
Thank you for your kind words! We're so glad to hear you had a great stay. Ava and the team will be thrilled to know they made your experience enjoyable.
We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

reviews.comments: Great place to stay. Clean, comfortable, plenty of storage and friendly, helpful staff. I loved staying there
reviews.response:
Thank you for your fantastic review! We're delighted to hear that you found the place clean, comfortable, and well-equipped, and that our staff made a positive impact on your stay.
We’d love to welcome you back anytime!

reviews.comments: Good location with tube just around the corner. Shower didn’t drain properly and the water for shower, sink and toilet randomly turned off for a few hours. Had no other issues. Staff were helpful. Overall a good place to stay
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback! We're glad to hear that you enjoyed the convenient location and found our staff helpful. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the shower drainage issue and the intermittent water supply. We’ll make sure to address these concerns to improve the experience for future guests. Despite these issues, we're pleased you had a good stay overall, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back in the future!

reviews.comments:
(+) Centrally located, multiple shops close by, easy check in and the possibility to leave your luggage at check out, comfortable beds and modern looking room. Responsive host.
(-) A bit of a dusty room, multiple hairs on ‘clean’ towels. The constant banging of doors from other guests at crazy hours in the morning. Trash bags from other guests left behind in the kitchen for almost the whole duration of my stay (1 week).
reviews.response:
Thank you for your honest feedback. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed our central location, easy check-in process, comfortable beds, and the modern look of the room. It’s also great to know that our host was responsive to your needs.
However, we sincerely apologize for the issues you encountered. The dust in the room, hairs on the towels, and noise from other guests are not up to our usual standards. We'll be addressing these concerns with our cleaning team to ensure better service in the future. Additionally, we'll make sure that common areas, like the kitchen, are monitored more frequently to avoid trash being left behind.
We appreciate your feedback as it helps us improve. If there's anything else you'd like to discuss, please don't hesitate to reach out. We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience in the future.

reviews.comments: Was really good
reviews.response: Thank you for the feedback! We're happy to hear you had a good experience. If there's anything specific you enjoyed or if you have any suggestions, we'd love to hear them. Looking forward to hosting you again!

reviews.comments: Excelente alojamiento, muy tranquilo, tienes tu espacio, baño privado y una cama muy cómoda para dormir. Volvería con mucho gusto.

localizedReview.comments: Excellent accommodation, very quiet, you have your space, private bathroom and a very comfortable bed to sleep. I would come back with great taste.
localizedReview.response: Thank you so much for your positive comment! We are very happy to know that you enjoyed the tranquility, the space, the private bathroom and the comfort of the bed. It would be a pleasure to have you back. If you need anything in the future or have any suggestions, please let us know. See you next time

reviews.response: ¡Muchas gracias por tu comentario tan positivo! Nos alegra mucho saber que disfrutaste de la tranquilidad, el espacio, el baño privado y la comodidad de la cama. Sería un placer tenerte de vuelta. Si necesitas algo en el futuro o tienes alguna sugerencia, no dudes en decírnoslo. ¡Hasta la próxima

reviews.comments:
I have been recently, is a space for students.
For the price that I payed I couldn’t ask too much.
Position is very good, metro is just 5 min by walk and with one stop you’ll be to king cross.
Room is comfortable, if you don’t want too much and pay less is the perfect place here.
reviews.response: Thank you for sharing your experience! We're glad to hear that the location and the comfort of the room met your needs, especially given the value for the price. It’s great to know that the proximity to the metro made your travel convenient. If you need anything else or have any further suggestions, feel free to let us know. We hope to have the opportunity to host you again!

reviews.comments: I really enjoyed my stay there. Excellent location and very friendly staff.
reviews.response:

We hope to welcome you back for another great experience!

Thank you for your feedback! We're glad to hear you had a nice stay.

reviews.comments: Perfectly as described. Exactly what I needed. I needed to extend my stay and they were super accommodating.
reviews.response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're delighted to hear that everything was just as described and that our place met your needs perfectly. It was our pleasure to accommodate your extended stay, and we’re always here to help. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

reviews.comments: This is a great option for a no fuss stopover. 24hr security and clean apartments. Not brand new, but definitely do the job. Exactly how they are listed. Recommended!
reviews.response: Thank you so much for your positive review! We're glad to hear that you appreciated the 24-hour security and cleanliness of our apartments. We strive to provide exactly what we promise in our listings, and it's great to know that we met your expectations. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to hosting you again in the future!

reviews.comments: Perfect budget option. No complains
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback! We're glad to hear that you found our place to be a perfect budget option. If there's anything we can do to make your next stay even better, please let us know. We hope to welcome you back soon!

reviews.comments: 주방 같은 공용 시설이 더럽다는 후기를 보고 걱정 했는데 28일동안 너무 깨끗했고 모든 공간이 너무 펀안했습니다. 창문 밖으로 공원이 있어 풍경도 너무 이뻤어요.

localizedReview.comments: I was worried when I saw the reviews that the shared facilities such as the kitchen were dirty, but it was so clean for 28 days, and all the spaces were so uncomfortable. There was a park outside the window, so the view was so pretty.
localizedReview.response: Thank you so much for your warm review! We are glad to hear that the shared facilities, such as the kitchen, were kept clean and comfortable. Also, I'm so glad you enjoyed the park view outside your window. We look forward to working with you again in the future. We can't wait to host you again! All the best.

reviews.response: 따뜻한 후기를 남겨주셔서 정말 감사합니다! 주방과 같은 공용 시설이 깨끗하게 유지되어 안심하고 편안하게 지내셨다니 다행입니다. 또한, 창문 밖의 공원 풍경까지 즐기셨다니 정말 기쁩니다. 앞으로도 더 나은 서비스를 제공할 수 있도록 항상 노력하겠습니다. 다시 만나 뵙기를 기대합니다! 감사합니다.

reviews.comments: good stay of a month
reviews.response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We're glad to hear you had a good month with us. If there's anything we can do to make your next stay even better, please let us know. We hope to welcome you back soon!

reviews.comments: you have to care about cleaning.its realy dirty
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the cleanliness issues you encountered. Your comments are important to us, and we will address them with our cleaning team to ensure improvements are made. We appreciate your input and hope to provide a better experience on your next visit.

reviews.comments:
學生宿舍感覺非常安全，樓下有超市。
床很舒服，對一個人來說空間很大
門的設計需要很大力關門，所以有人出入聲響很大，睡眠質素好的不影響
獨立浴室，但去水很慢，會有水浸情況

localizedReview.comments:
The student residence felt very safe and there is a supermarket downstairs.
The beds were comfortable and there was a lot of space for one person
The design of the door needs a lot of force to close the door, so there is a lot of noise from people coming and going, and the quality of sleep is not affected.
The bathroom is private but the water is slow to go and there will be water immersion
localizedReview.response: Thank you for sharing your stay!We are happy to know that you felt safe in your stay and were satisfied with the comfort of the beds and the size of the room.We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the design of the door and the drainage in the bathroom.These issues will be brought to the attention of the relevant authorities in order to improve as soon as possible.We hope to make your experience better next time and look forward to welcoming you back!

reviews.response: 感谢您分享住宿体验！我们很高兴知道您在住宿中感到安全，并对床的舒适度和房间的大小感到满意。我们对门的设计和浴室的排水问题给您带来的不便表示歉意。我们将提请相关部门注意这些问题，以便尽快改进。我们希望下次能为您提供更好的体验，并期待您的再次光临！

reviews.comments: Lage  gut, U-Bahn fußläufig erreichbar. Zimmer leider nicht ganz sauber. Viele Abnutzungen, Möbel schon älter. Die Matratze war komplett durchgelegen, wurde aber nach Rücksprache an der Rezeption getauscht.

localizedReview.comments: Location  good, subway in walking distance. Unfortunately, the room is not quite clean. Lots of wear and tear, furniture older. The mattress was completely saggy, but was replaced after consultation at the reception.
localizedReview.response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad that you enjoyed the location and the proximity to the subway. We apologize for the inconvenience with the cleanliness and wear of the furniture. It is good to hear that we were able to resolve the issue with the mattress after your consultation. We will use your feedback to further improve the quality of our service. Thank you for your understanding, and we hope to welcome you back in the future.

reviews.response: Vielen Dank, dass Sie sich die Zeit genommen haben, Ihre Erfahrung mit uns zu teilen. Es freut uns, dass Ihnen die Lage und die Nähe zur U-Bahn gefallen haben. Wir entschuldigen uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten bezüglich der Sauberkeit und der Abnutzung der Möbel. Es ist gut zu hören, dass wir das Problem mit der Matratze nach Ihrer Rücksprache lösen konnten. Wir werden Ihre Rückmeldung nutzen, um die Qualität unseres Services weiter zu verbessern. Vielen Dank für Ihr Verständnis, und wir hoffen, Sie in Zukunft wieder bei uns begrüßen zu dürfen.

reviews.comments: Good stay, amazing experience
reviews.response: Thank you, Bhumika, for your kind words! We're thrilled that you had a good stay and an amazing experience. We look forward to hosting you again in the future!

reviews.comments: It was perfect for my stay in London - affordable, accessible, and the staff were helpful.
reviews.response: We’re thrilled to hear that your stay in London was perfect! It’s great that the affordability, accessibility, and helpful staff contributed to your positive experience. If you have any more trips planned or need assistance in the future, feel free to reach out.

reviews.comments: La comunicación con el equipo fue agradable

localizedReview.comments: Communication with the team was nice
localizedReview.response: We are very happy to hear that the communication with the team was pleasant! If you need anything else in the future, let us know. We look forward to having you!

reviews.response: ¡Nos alegra mucho saber que la comunicación con el equipo fue agradable! Si necesitas algo más en el futuro, no dudes en decírnoslo. ¡Esperamos tenerte de nuevo pronto!

reviews.comments: For a short period of time it was a great place and way cheaper than hotels and apartments in central London. Would definitely recommend
reviews.response: Thank you for the great feedback! We’re glad to hear you found it a good value for your stay in London. We appreciate the recommendation and hope to see you again!

reviews.comments:
The team was always available for clarification both remotely and live in the facility lobby.
Quiet and clean environment within walking distance of the subway.
reviews.response: It’s wonderful to hear that our team was consistently available to assist you and that you enjoyed the quiet and clean environment. We’re glad the location worked well for you, too. Thank you for the positive feedback!

reviews.comments: I had a lovely stay and the accomodation was exactly what I was looking for (budget, location and cleanliness). Thank you for hosting me!
reviews.response: We’re thrilled to hear that you had a lovely stay and that the accommodation met your needs perfectly. Thank you for your kind words! We’d be delighted to host you again in the future.

reviews.comments: Decent student accommodation and friendly staff!
reviews.response: Thanks for your feedback! We're glad to hear you found the student accommodation decent and the staff friendly. If you have any suggestions for improvement, we’d love to hear them.

reviews.comments: Room was great, really good location, building in general was kinda rough around the edges but honestly you won't get much better value for money than this place
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback. We're pleased you liked the room and found the location convenient. We appreciate your understanding regarding the building's condition. We’re working on improvements and aim to provide good value while addressing any areas that need attention. Your insights are valuable for us to enhance our service.

reviews.comments:
The room's comfortable for one person, I had to work during my stay and the desk and chair were perfect for it. As for the cleanliness of the room, I'd say it needs to be better. My toilet lid was broken and kept falling off and my shower would get flooded in less than 1 min. The toilet was very very uncomfortable, so it might be the thing that would make me thing twice before choosing this place again.
The bed sheets had some hair on them, I just cleaned them myself to feel more at ease, but I'd say that also needs to be better.
The staff was very friendly and always helped me with any doubts I had.
reviews.response:
Thank you for your detailed feedback. We’re pleased that you found the room comfortable and the desk and chair suited your work needs. However, we’re sorry to hear about the issues with cleanliness, the broken toilet lid, and the flooding shower. This is definitely not the experience we aim to provide.
We’ll address these maintenance and cleanliness concerns with our team to ensure they’re promptly resolved. It’s great to hear that our staff was helpful—your feedback will help us improve our overall service. We hope to have the chance to provide a better experience in the future.

reviews.comments: Perfect for a simple, no frills stop over.
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback! We’re glad to hear that our place met your needs for a straightforward stopover. If you need anything more in the future or have any suggestions, feel free to let us know. Safe travels!

reviews.comments: Very well located cozy room. The staff was very friendly and helpful at all times and the room was very comfortable and clean. Great experience in London if you want to be close to the city
reviews.response: Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found the room comfortable and clean. It's great to know that our staff could help make your experience in London even better. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

reviews.comments: Great location, so easy to get into central London. Great staff and amenities
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the convenient location, staff, and amenities. We hope to welcome you back for another great stay soon!

reviews.comments: I enjoyed staying here, the bathroom for me had a bit of a funny smell I couldn’t put my finger on, all the other residents were quiet but the doors are really loud (both the ones that section off the halls and the ones to the rooms) so you can really hear when people are entering as it’s a domino effect of noise (plus I felt bad entering sometimes as I know it would’ve been loud for others) it was what you’d expect for student accommodation - there’s always something right? Fair and good price & location!!
reviews.response: Thank you for sharing your experience! We're glad you enjoyed your stay and found the price and location to be fair and good. We appreciate your feedback about the bathroom smell and the noise from the doors. We’ll look into ways to address these issues to improve future stays. Thanks again for choosing us!

reviews.comments: The team was really professional and helpful every time. The room was pristine clean when I arrived. Very reasonable priced accomodation.
reviews.response: Thank you for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you found our team professional and the room in pristine condition. It's great to know that you felt the accommodation was reasonably priced. We hope to welcome you back soon!

reviews.comments: The place was clean, but the hallway was a bit noisy. You could hear people coming and going (opening and closing doors) in the middle of the night and early in the morning. Some noise from the street.
reviews.response: Thank you for sharing your experience. We're glad to hear you found the place clean. We apologize for the noise disturbance and will look into ways to improve soundproofing. We hope to have the chance to host you again in the future.

reviews.comments: Perfect for a no frills stopover.
reviews.response: Thank you for your review! We're glad our place met your needs for a simple and convenient stopover. Safe travels, and we hope to welcome you back in the future!

reviews.comments: Gerne wieder!!! Alles war sehr gut. Man sollte aber beachten, dass man für die Küche seine eigenen Kochtöpfe, -geschirr, Besteck und Gläser braucht. Ansonsten: Sehr zu empfehlen!

localizedReview.comments: Gladly again!!! Everything was very good. However, it should be noted that you need your own cooking pots, dishes, cutlery and glasses for the kitchen. Otherwise: Highly recommend!

reviews.response: Vielen Dank für Ihre Bewertung! Es freut uns, dass Ihnen Ihr Aufenthalt gefallen hat. Wir nehmen zur Kenntnis, dass eigene Küchenutensilien mitgebracht werden müssen und werden dies klarer kommunizieren. Wir hoffen, Sie bald wieder begrüßen zu dürfen!

reviews.comments: We booked for our daughter to stay and she loved every minute of the stay.
reviews.response: We are absolutely delighted to receive your exceptional review, and we genuinely value you as our guest. Your kind words hold great significance for us, and we eagerly anticipate the chance to host you once more in the future!

reviews.comments: Friendly staff and convenient location. Room is clean itself though shared kitchen isn't.
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback. We're pleased to hear that you found our staff friendly and the location convenient. We apologize for the cleanliness issue in the shared kitchen area. Your feedback is important to us, and we'll work on improving the cleanliness of the common areas to ensure a more enjoyable stay for our guests. We hope to have the opportunity to host you again in the future.

reviews.comments: Overall, the room wasn't bad. However, the room was a bit small and was not cleaned regularly.
reviews.response:
Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We appreciate your honesty and take your comments seriously.
We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the room size and cleaning frequency. We understand that a clean and comfortable environment is essential for our guests, and we'll address these concerns with our housekeeping team to ensure that our rooms are consistently cleaned and well-maintained.

reviews.comments:
Thank you so much.
It is a good place.
Only the laundry is not good cause it needs to take time to download and register an account before washes the clothes and have 5 pounds per each add fund’s condition. And changing new app issue let me feel bad.
reviews.response:
You're very welcome, and we appreciate your feedback. We're glad to hear that you find our place to be good overall.
We understand that the laundry process, including the need to download and register an account, as well as the additional 5 pounds per load, can be inconvenient. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Your feedback is valuable, and we'll explore ways to streamline and improve the laundry experience to make it more user-friendly in the future.
Thank you for sharing your concerns, and we hope to continue hosting you in the future with a more convenient laundry solution.

reviews.comments:
This is a great place to stay, close to all the happening places in London and still affordable.
It would be good if the common areas like kitchen and lobbies are cleaned more often. Considering that guests stay here for short duration and everyone is not equally responsible, the common areas tend to get dirty and unhygienic.
Other than this, the staff is very friendly and supportive. Overall a great experience.
reviews.response:
Thank you for sharing your positive experience during your stay in London. We're delighted to hear that you found our location convenient and affordable, with proximity to popular attractions.
We appreciate your feedback regarding the common areas, such as the kitchen and lobbies. Maintaining cleanliness and hygiene in shared spaces is important to us, and we will take your suggestion into consideration to ensure these areas are cleaned more frequently.
It's wonderful to hear that you found our staff friendly and supportive. Providing excellent service is a top priority for us.

reviews.comments:
Hi,
Great location, nice building, modern, but if you’re over 30, maybe not the place you will feel comfortable in, okay deal
reviews.response: We are filled with gratitude upon receiving your exceptional review, and we genuinely cherish your presence as our guest. Your kind words hold tremendous significance for us, and we eagerly look forward to the opportunity of hosting you once more in the future!

reviews.comments:
Overall it was good value for the price. It offered a private bathroom, gym access, a laundry room, and easy access to the Piccadilly line. Would book again.
Careful with circuit laundry machines though, the app is very buggy. Only put it enough money for one wash at a time. It will steal your balance

We're pleased to hear that you found good value for the price and appreciated the amenities we offer, like the private bathroom, gym access, and laundry room. reviews.comments: Nice place for a short visit. Has the basics and a nice desk to do remote working. There’s room for improvement with the bed mattresses but all in all I really liked it. The area is very convenient as it’s around the corner from Caledonian Road tube station. And the staff were friendly too. Highly recommended!

It's great to hear that you found the place nice for a short visit and that it provides the basics along with a comfortable desk for remote working. Your feedback about the bed mattresses is noted and appreciated as well.
The convenience of the area, being close to Caledonian Road tube station, is definitely a plus. Friendly staff can make a big difference, so it's wonderful to know that you had a positive experience with them. Thank you for your recommendation! reviews.comments: The place is very loud when other guests close the door on the hallway, it's extremely annoying and the kitchen was super dirty due to some guest that had no manner and did not know how to live with other people. I made a complain about the kitchen and no one did anything. Other than this, it was fine and worth the price for just a short period of stay it is perfect.
reviews.response:
Thank you for sharing your feedback about your stay. We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced due to noisy hallway doors and the cleanliness of the kitchen. We understand how these issues can be disruptive and frustrating. We'll address these concerns with our staff to ensure a more pleasant and considerate environment for all guests in the future.
We're glad to hear that overall, you found the place to be worth the price for short stays. We appreciate your input and hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a more enjoyable experience on your next visit. Your feedback helps us improve.

reviews.comments: Thank you. Great staff, very helpful and the place feels safe, there is security staff. The location is beautiful with gardens and very well located but yet not in the buzzing center. It is easily accessible: there is a subway stop to King's Cross (you can get to pretty much anywhere) or if you feel up for it, a 30 min walk. The place is like the picture and the room was very clean, with all the basic amenities. Thanks to Chapter Islington, my stay in London was even better.
reviews.response: Receiving your exceptional review has filled us with absolute delight, and we truly cherish you as our guest. Your kind words carry tremendous importance for us, and we eagerly look forward to the opportunity to host you again in the future!

reviews.comments: The room itself was great, exactly as described. Staff at the reception were friendly and helpful. Unfortunately the kitchen in the flat was filthy - on check-in I was told they would send housekeeping up as it was very dirty. I was there Thurs-Sun and it got progressively worse, with actual rotting fruit on the side, piles of dishes with crusty food and dirty water in the sink, and the microwave was covered in splattered food. A shame because the location and room were great!
reviews.response:
Thank you for sharing your experience. It's wonderful to hear that the room matched the description and that the reception staff were friendly and helpful.
I apologize for the cleanliness issues you encountered in the kitchen. It's disappointing when such essential areas aren't maintained properly. It sounds like there was a miscommunication or lapse in housekeeping services. Your feedback is important for improvement.
I'm glad to know that you still found positives in the location and the room itself. If you ever plan on returning or have more insights to share, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to ensure your stay is as pleasant as possible. 🏨🍽️🌟

reviews.comments: It was great experience. Room is clean, staff are nice. Very close to the station, it’s easy to go to the central. Strongly recommended.

reviews.comments:
Never again… surrounded by noisy inconsiderate students. Walls as thick as curtains. Room allocated on ground floor next to a fire door that slammed day and night. Kitchen sink filled with dirty dishes that were there on 26th July and still there when I checked out early on 1st August. No crockery or cutlery available for first 3 days of my stay and found some washed next to the sink on day 4.
Best thing was that it was close to Caledonian Rd Piccadilly Line Tube station and there are green spaces nearby.

reviews.comments: Extremely responsive to guests’ needs and allowed an early check in because my plane arrived early. Easy to find, good amenities, even a gym to use! You have your own privacy and ensuite, however, the only issue I had was facing the courtyard as you tend to hear and likely receive less privacy due to the proximity. I switched rooms to alter the noise level etc. and the team were absolutely amazing at finding a solution. Right next to the Caledonian Road, underground, and plenty of buses. Definitely worth the price that you pay, I 100% will consider staying again the next time I’m in London☺️.

reviews.comments:
The place was good, clean and easily accessible..
But the team was very slow to respond
Another problem was with the water in the bathroom.. the water pressures was too slow and the shower was too small
If that can be overlooked, it is a great place for a short stay as the public transport is very convenient
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback. We're glad you found the place clean and easily accessible. We apologize for the slow response from our team and the issues with water pressure and shower size. We'll work on improving these aspects to provide a better experience for our guests. We appreciate your understanding and hope you'll consider staying with us again in the future.

reviews.comments:
The room was simple and great for what I needed with good location and nice welcoming staff.
The downfall was the shared kitchen space, although modern with clearly new equipment, the other guests did not clean up after themselves. This left the place dirty and hard for me to use. I confronted friendly staff multiple times about having only the bin changed, in over week it never got changed and I got sick of asking.
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback, Kiri. We're pleased that our simple and well-located room suited your needs, and that you found our staff welcoming. However, we apologize for the issues you encountered with the shared kitchen space. It's unfortunate that other guests didn't maintain cleanliness. We take this seriously and will address the matter to ensure a better experience for all guests. We're sorry for the inconvenience with the bin change and appreciate your patience. Your input helps us improve, and we hope to provide a more pleasant stay in the future.

reviews.comments: Very lovely staff. Friendly warm place to stay. Anytime again. Easy to get around.
reviews.response: We are thrilled to have received your exceptional review, and we hold great appreciation for you as our guest. Your kind words hold immense value to us, and we eagerly anticipate the chance to host you once again in the future!

reviews.comments:
The host confirmed the whole property was smoke free. They stated, in writing, both public and private areas were no smoking and I could be reassured of a smoke free stay. That wasn’t the case, with people smoking on the property and outside my room, including none night at 2.30, smoking cannabis.
The entire building is excessively hot. The team acknowledged there was an issue with the heat but said there was nothing they could do other than provide a fan (to circulate the hot air).
The shower in the first room didn’t work. 80% of the water drizzled out of a leaking pipe, and it was one temperature-very hot. It couldn’t be turned down.
I was moved to another room, which was cooler as it had two windows but, the first night someone was hammering on the wall for ages. Security were called and could hear the noise but couldn’t find which room. Second night the ground floor tenants were yelling in the early hours. On two days I couldn’t shower as the tray was blocked with water. Avoid
reviews.response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We apologize for the inconveniences you faced during your stay, including the smoking issues, excessive heat, maintenance problems, and disturbances. Your feedback is important, and we're sorry that your experience fell short of your expectations. We'll use your comments to address these concerns and make necessary improvements. We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better stay in the future.

reviews.comments: This is an friendly neighbourhood for uni student, which only one station away for King’s Cross. The shared kitchen is in very good condition and the room is very big for single tourists. Several supermarkets nearby to get food and only 5 mins walk to the underground.

reviews.comments:
All in all it was a good stay in a student dorm. It felt safe and it’s easily accessible.
My only remarks would be regarding the dated bathroom (despite it being clean it looked a bit rough) and the shower drain that didn’t work well. Despite the info that toiletries are included I was told at reception when asking for toilet paper that it isn’t included which I thought was odd. Maybe this needs to be updated in the description.
When I reported the strong smell of weed on my hall throughout my stay the receptionist just told me that I should have reported it to security. Since there are so many employees working there, securities, housekeeping, I thought they would also have an eye on housing rules. Apparently was wrong.
If you’re on a budget, yet want to have some privacy, this is still a good accommodation.
reviews.response: Thank you for your review and feedback. We're glad to hear that overall, you had a good stay and felt safe and comfortable in our student dorm. We apologize for the issues you experienced with the bathroom, shower drain, and the confusion about toiletries. We'll take your comments into consideration to improve our descriptions and service. Regarding the strong smell of weed, we'll also address this with our team to ensure a better response in the future. We appreciate your understanding and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for an even better experience.

reviews.comments: It was a nice place and friendly people
reviews.response: Hosting a remarkable guest like you was an incredible experience. We genuinely value your kind feedback, and we eagerly anticipate the opportunity to host you again in the future!

reviews.comments: I was surprised at the value for money of this location. My room was private and quiet with its own bathroom, and shared kitchen.  Everything was clean and basic - just what I needed in this trip. The building has excellent facilities (including a gym and laundry), and is run on an industrial scale. Initial communication was frustrating (especially with the glitchy booking confirmation system that asks you to upload your ID, which I had to repeat three times!), but that’s a small price to pay for an excellent location at a very reasonable rate per night. Will definitely consider staying here again.
reviews.response: Thank you for your valuable feedback! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the excellent value and facilities provided during your stay. We apologize for any inconvenience caused during the booking process and appreciate your understanding. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip!

localizedReview.comments: Everything was very good, I already knew the area and the stay was pleasant.
localizedReview.response: We greatly appreciate you taking the time to provide us with a review, which plays a vital role in the success of an Airbnb host. Their feedback is very valuable and we sincerely appreciate it. We are glad to hear that your stay was pleasant and hope we will have the opportunity to accommodate you again.

reviews.response: Apreciamos enormemente que dedique su tiempo a proporcionarnos una reseña, que desempeña un papel vital en el éxito de un anfitrión de Airbnb. Su opinión es muy valiosa y se lo agradecemos sinceramente. Nos alegra saber que su estancia fue agradable y esperamos tener la oportunidad de alojarle de nuevo.

reviews.comments: A wonderful place to stay in London!
reviews.response: "Thank you for staying with us and for your lovely review. Your kind words hold immense meaning to us, and we eagerly await the opportunity to host you again in the future! 			"

reviews.comments: Thanks for the comfortable stay
reviews.response: We sincerely appreciate the time you took to share your review with us. As an Airbnb host, reviews play a crucial role in our success, and we value them greatly. Your positive feedback is especially gratifying, and we are delighted that your stay was enjoyable. We eagerly anticipate the opportunity to host you again in the future.

reviews.comments: Great location, staff was friendly and helpful.
reviews.response: We sincerely appreciate your stay and the wonderful review you left. Your kind words mean a lot to us, and we are eagerly looking forward to the chance to host you once more in the future!

reviews.comments: It was a great place with good facilities. My friends and I were really comfortable at the place
reviews.response: We deeply appreciate your valuable review and the time you took to share it with us. Reviews play a vital role in the success of Airbnb hosts, and we are grateful for your contribution. It's wonderful to hear that your stay was enjoyable, and we eagerly anticipate the opportunity to host you once more.

reviews.comments: The place was nice but the bathroom needs some updating as well as the door to the main building. Please try and get that squeak fixed!! Otherwise I had a good stay the room was cozy and the kitchen was really cool and spacious it just needs some more bowls or something like this to eat. I would stay again though the staff was really nice and helpful.
reviews.response: Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate your kind words about our cozy room, cool and spacious kitchen, and helpful staff. We'll definitely take your suggestions into consideration and work on updating the bathroom and fixing the door squeak. We'll also ensure to add more bowls for your convenience. We look forward to hosting you again in the future!

reviews.comments: Good Accommodation and comfortable stay in a great location with easy access to the underground.
reviews.response: We greatly appreciate your choice to stay with us. Your exceptional review has filled us with profound gratitude, and we genuinely value your presence as our guest. Your kind words carry immense importance to us, and we eagerly look forward to the chance of hosting you again in the future!

reviews.comments:
Hi
Liked everything about the stay. Only feed back would be the check out time.. I expected it to by 12 noon but was asked to vacate at 10am.
reviews.response: Thank you for your review! We're glad you liked everything about your stay. We apologize for any confusion about the check-out time. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we'll make sure to clarify the check-out time for future guests. We hope to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay in the future! Thank you for choosing to stay with us!

reviews.comments: Good spot to stay when just arriving from overseas. Friendly staff and secure building facilities. Room was fine and kitchen was clean an tidy.
reviews.response: We are absolutely delighted to receive your exceptional review, and we genuinely value you as our guest. Your kind words hold great significance for us, and we eagerly anticipate the chance to host you once more in the future!

reviews.comments: Will definately be back!
reviews.response: Thank you for your positive feedback! We're glad to hear that you had a great stay and would be delighted to welcome you back in the future. If you have any further comments or suggestions, please don't hesitate to let us know.
